events.message: I just received my order today, but the product is damaged and has multiple scratches all over the surface.
The reported issue has been classified under Product Defect due to the customer's description of damage and scratches.
The case has been assigned to agent Maria to handle the product defect complaint and assist the customer.
Hello, I’m Maria from customer support. I am sorry to hear about the damage to your product. I’m here to help resolve this for you.
Could you please send us photos of the damage and let us know if the packaging was also affected upon delivery?
I’ve attached several pictures showing the scratches and dents. The box was slightly crushed but no signs of mishandling outside delivery.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement unit shipped as soon as possible or a full refund if you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement, thanks for the quick response and offer to resolve the issue.
We have processed your replacement order and it will be shipped within 24 hours with expedited delivery.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement and that everything is in perfect condition now.
